import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { ReactComponent as Logo } from '../../assets/original.svg' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { auth } from '../firebase/firebase.utils' import './header.styles.scss' const Header = ({ currentUser }) => (
SHOP CONTACT { currentUser ? (
auth.signOut()}> SIGN OUT
) :( SIGN IN ) }
) const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return {currentUser: state.user.currentUser} } export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Header)
